post.title: eraser, outbreak, under siege 2, coming to blu-ray september 2nd-
post.content: the list of blu-ray titles i have to get in september just went up to 26. warner are releasing these titles in the us september 2nd- 1. every which way but loose 2. gauntlet 3. outbreak 4. eraser 5. under siege 2 http://www.thehdroom.com/news/gauntl...alog_wave/3096
